title: Stage S17
description: Level 1 grammar practice focusing on stage-specific patterns and expressions.
examples: It will probably be sunny this weekend.
learning_points: Level 1 target grammar and expressions with practical usage examples

sentences.en: Maybe it will rain tomorrow.

sentences.kr: 이번 주말은 아마 맑을 거예요. (높은 확률)
sentences.en: It will probably be sunny this weekend.
I'm sure you'll do well on the exam.
I guess she forgot about the meeting.
He will definitely come to the party.

sentences.kr: 아마도 우리가 더 일찍 떠나야 할 것 같아요.
sentences.en: Perhaps we should leave earlier.
I doubt that he will finish on time.
There's a good chance that it will work.
I have no doubt that she will succeed.
It's possible that they might change their mind.
Maybe it will rain tomorrow.

sentences.kr: 이번 주말은 아마 맑을 거예요. (높은 확률)
sentences.en: It will probably be sunny this weekend.

I doubt that he will finish on time.
